Uses of Interface
client.IClientCommand

Packages that use IClientCommand
client   
 

Uses of IClientCommand in client
 

Classes in client that implement IClientCommand
 class BackupCommand
          Implement the "backup" command in the client.
 class ChangeDirCommand
          Implement the cd or chdir command to change the current directory in the client config.
 class CopyCommand
          Class to handle the cp or copy command.
 class DeviceCommand
          Handle the device or dev command to change the currently logged in device.
 class DevicesCommand
          Handle the devices or devs command to print the list of available devices.
 class ListCommand
          Handle the list or ls command to list the files.
 class LoginCommand
          Handle the login command, which is implicitly invoked by the client when launched and not already logged in.
 class LogoutCommand
          Handle the logout command.
 class RestoreCommand
          Handle the restore command.
 class RootDirCommand
          Handler to change or display the current local root directory for the user on a particular device.
 class SelectDeviceCommand
          Handle the select command to change or display the currently selected device.
